snippet: Former President Carlos Saúl Menem was sentenced to seven years in prison on Thursday for smuggling weapons to Ecuador and Croatia in violation of international embargoes in the 1990s.
abstract: Former Argentine Pres Carlos Saul Menem is sentenced to seven years in prison for illegally smuggling weapons to Ecuador and Croatia in violation of international embargoes in the 1990s.
lead_paragraph: Former President Carlos Saúl Menem was sentenced to seven years in prison on Thursday for smuggling weapons to Ecuador and Croatia in violation of international embargoes in the 1990s.
